sub-events.comment: Sideways movement when gravity is left or right
Sideways movement when gravity is up or down

action.name: Set X
action.param: min(RArrowSprite.X - ampmod * cos(RArrowSprite.ReverseSpeedMultiplier * ((time - RArrowSprite.ReverseMarker) * freqmod)), PlayerHitbox.X)

action.name: Set X
action.param: max(RArrowSprite.X + ampmod * cos(RArrowSprite.ReverseSpeedMultiplier * ((time - RArrowSprite.ReverseMarker) * freqmod)), PlayerHitbox.X)

action.name: Set Y
action.param: min(RArrowSprite.Y - ampmod * cos(RArrowSprite.ReverseSpeedMultiplier * ((time - RArrowSprite.ReverseMarker) * freqmod)), PlayerHitbox.Y)

action.name: Set Y
action.param: min(RArrowSprite.Y - ampmod * cos(RArrowSprite.ReverseSpeedMultiplier * ((time - RArrowSprite.ReverseMarker) * freqmod)), PlayerHitbox.Y)

sub-events.comment: No idea what is going on here, so decompiled code ftw.
Original calculation meant to lerp BaseSize to 35*scale over 4 frames at 30fps

action.name: Set width
action.param: ((UndyneHPBackground.Timeout- UndyneHPBackground.TimeBetweenEnd) / (1.25 - UndyneHPBackground.TimeBetweenEnd)) * ((UndyneLastHP - UndyneHP) / UndyneMaxHP) * UndyneHPBackground.Width + (UndyneHP / UndyneMaxHP) * UndyneHPBackground.Width
